com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder

Class AbstractStreamValueBuilder<B>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder.AbstractStreamValueBuilder<B>
  • Type Parameters:
    B - the current builder's type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueBuilder<B>

    public abstract class AbstractStreamValueBuilder<B>
extends Object
implements ValueBuilder<B>
    The AbstractStreamValueBuilder class is an abstract convenience implementation of ValueBuilder and provides all the common value encodings. When implementing a ValueBuilder based interface, it is highly recommended to build on the base of this abstract class to have support for future extension of the interface.

      • putString

        public B putString(String value)
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes a String at the current position into the CBOR stream. If value is null, a null-type will be written.

        The given string will be tested to only contain ASCII characters and will be, if possible, encoded using a ByteString, otherwise as a TextString.

        Specified by:
        putString in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Parameters:
        value - the value to encode
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putByteString

        public B putByteString(String value)
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes a String at the current position into the CBOR stream. If value is null, a null-type will be written.

        The given string is tested to only contain ASCII characters and will throw an UnsupportedEncodingException if non-encodeable characters are found.

        Specified by:
        putByteString in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Parameters:
        value - the value to encode
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putIndefiniteByteString

        public IndefiniteStringBuilder<B> putIndefiniteByteString()
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes an indefinite length ASCII-string at the current position into the CBOR stream. The returned builder can be used to write an arbitrary number of String elements to the stream. Those, while parsing, will be concatenated into a single string. This is most practical when the string is not immediately available but will be generated in chunks.
        Specified by:
        putIndefiniteByteString in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putIndefiniteTextString

        public IndefiniteStringBuilder<B> putIndefiniteTextString()
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes an indefinite length UTF-8-string at the current position into the CBOR stream. The returned builder can be used to write an arbitrary number of String elements to the stream. Those, while parsing, will be concatenated into a single string. This is most practical when the string is not immediately available but will be generated in chunks.
        Specified by:
        putIndefiniteTextString in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putValue

        public B putValue(Object value)
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes an Object at the current position into the CBOR stream. The object will be written as one of the known types (this includes any registered semantic tag encoder, see TagStrategy) and will throw a WrongTypeException if the value cannot be encoded. If value is null, a null-type will be written.
        Specified by:
        putValue in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Parameters:
        value - the value to encode
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putTag

        public B putTag(Object value)
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes an Object at the current position into the CBOR stream. The object will be written by utilizing the registered semantic tag encoder (see TagStrategy) and will throw a WrongTypeException if the value cannot be encoded. If value is null, a null-type will be written.
        Specified by:
        putTag in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Parameters:
        value - the value to encode
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putSequence

        public SequenceBuilder<B> putSequence()
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes an indefinite sized sequence (array) at the current position into the CBOR stream. The returned SequenceBuilder can be used to put an arbitrary number of elements into the sequence.

        Since indefinite sized sequences are slower to parse, it is recommended to use ValueBuilder.putSequence(long) with the known number of elements whenever possible.

        Specified by:
        putSequence in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putSequence

        public SequenceBuilder<B> putSequence(long elements)
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes a fixed sized sequence (array) at the current position into the CBOR stream. The returned SequenceBuilder can be used to put the exact given elements number of elements into the sequence. This method throws an IllegalStateException when more or less elements are provided than defined.
        Specified by:
        putSequence in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Parameters:
        elements - the number of elements to put into the sequence
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putDictionary

        public DictionaryBuilder<B> putDictionary()
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes an indefinite sized dictionary (map) at the current position into the CBOR stream. The returned DictionaryBuilder can be used to put an arbitrary number of key-value pairs into the dictionary.

        Since indefinite sized dictionaries are slower to parse, it is recommended to use ValueBuilder.putDictionary(long) with the known number of pairs whenever possible.

        Specified by:
        putDictionary in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Returns:
        the current builder

      • putDictionary

        public DictionaryBuilder<B> putDictionary(long elements)
        Description copied from interface: ValueBuilder
        Encodes a fixed sized dictionary (map) at the current position into the CBOR stream. The returned SequenceBuilder can be used to put the exact given elements number of key-value pairs into the dictionary. This method throws an IllegalStateException when more or less pairs are provided than defined.
        Specified by:
        putDictionary in interface ValueBuilder<B>
        Parameters:
        elements - the number of elements to put into the sequence
        Returns:
        the current builder
